overview:
Co-Founder and Director of Business Development SenionLab

Responsible for commercialization of advanced mobile sensor fusion technologies applied to indoor navigation and location based services. Facilitates the development of brand, commercial, product, demand creation and other strategies specific to the indoor navigation business unit of SenionLab. Oversees the commercial aspects of new and existing long-term contracts. Partner relationship management to ensure partnerships reach maximum potential. This involves identifying additional opportunities for the partners and working with the internal technical and development team for smooth execution.

Peter has vast experience in conducting research activities with the ability to bring research ideas into production and development. He enjoys acting as liaison between sales, marketing, and technology groups to support product positioning and customer demand as part of new product development.

Peter also holds an Associate Professor position in Computer Science at LinkÃ¶ping University Sweden where he is teaching Computer Science and Software Engineering courses at graduate and undergraduate level, and performs research in the area of model-driven engineering.

relationships.title: Co-Founder and Director of Business Development

milestones.description: Peter joined SenionLab as Director of Business Development
